description: {"blocks":[{"key":"9rjvo","text":"The COVID-19 pandemic has highlighted the need to identify novel therapeutic interventions and strategies for pandemic preparedness against Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome Coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
